column1: The endless trough conveyer is one of the latest applications of link-belting
column2: consisting primarily of a heavy chain belt carried over a pair of wheels
column3: and in the intermediate space a truck on which the train runs. This chain or belt is provided with pans which
column5: form an endless trough. Power being applied to revolve one of the wheels
column6: the whole belt is thereby set in motion and at once becomes an endless trough conveyer. The accompanying engraving illustrates a section of this conveyer. A few of the pans are removed
column7: to show the construction of the links; and above this a link and coupler are shown on a larger scale. As will be seen
column8: the link is provided with wings
column9: to form a rigid support for the pan to be riveted to it. To reduce friction each link is provided with three rollers
column10: as will be seen in the engraving. This outfit makes a fireproof conveyer which will handle hot ore from roasting kiln to crusher
column13: or other gritty and coarse material.
